data.title: Our Success Stories - Tucson AZ
data.meta_description: Read these remarkable patients’ success stories given as testimonials & reviews for our skilled dentists & staff of Martin Taylor Dentistry in Tucson, AZ
data.text:
Martin Taylor Dentistry Testimonial Video’s

Are Dr. Martin and Dr. Taylor the best dentists in the world? Neither of these doctors would say that about themselves, but their patients do hold them in high regard. They have a hard time imaging a dentist they could like more. Enjoy what these patients have to say about Dr. Martin and Dr. Taylor.

Did you know that you can now share the experience you had with us via an audio testimonial?

Call this toll-free number (855) 817-7789 and record your audio review now!

Recording an audio review is as easy as making a phone call!

Cecilia N.

I got two of my wisdom teeth taken out here, plus some fillings. I was absolutely terrified based on other dental experiences I had. Dr. Taylor made me feel so much more comfortable than when I initially first walked in there. Dr. Taylor is the best I could have ever asked for, I didn’t feel a thing and he explained everything clearly for me.

Richard C.

As always very friendly and professional. They will answer any question you have and explain it to you. I am a satisfied patient.

Bobbi S.

I just got my wisdom teeth out yesterday. I was so scared before hand, and their staff made me feel so comfortable from the moment I got their. I had an excellent experience and I would recommend them to anyone!

Rob M.

Friendly, efficient, professional and modern. Quality treatment from quality people. Thanks Jackie and Dr. Martin.

Alma Y.

I love my Dentist and Hygenist, they’re awesome. I had broken my back in February and had an appt a few months later when I went to see them, they were very patient considering it was tough to lay in the dentist chair for a long time. I highly recommend them their the best. Thank you and Happy New Year.

Tom H.

Seeing Jeff is always like seeing a good friend or relative. Very inviting and professional at the same time.

Teri H.

The staff are friendly and the doctors are kind! They do what needs to be done, not extra add on’s one may not require!

Chuck H.

The entire staff is so friendly and professional, always.

Brian H.

Dr. Taylor and his assistant where very professional. I hate the dentist, sat in the chair 2.5 hours with a root canal! Never felt a thing and was explaine what was happening the whole way. Recommend this office to any and everyone

Tiffany

We love Dr Taylor! He is so great and it’s our kids. He’s very caring and compassionate. He takes the time and listens to our concerns. Our son has sensory processing disorder and he only trusts Dr Taylor.

Amber J.

This place is amazing! The staff here make you feel like family and knew me by name after the first visit! Very welcoming and friendly!

Doug C.

I am new to the office, but my family has been patients for several years. I had a filling done yesterday, and I could not be more pleased with the experience. Nice people and great dentist. Thanks for being there!

Theresa B.

Dr. Taylor and the staff are excellent and kind people. They go out of their way to fit you in when needed. Thank you for your caring and great teamwork.

Patrick R.

We have only had excellent experiences with Dr. Martin and everyone in the office. Friendly, helpful and willing to work with patients.

Tara D.

Hands-down the absolute best dental office in Tucson! Thank you so much for taking such good care of my family. We you guys!

Johnny W.

I recommend Dr. Martin without reservation. I have always found him to be kind, competent, and a lot of fun to be around. He obviously stays up with the latest developments in his field. You combine his ongoing learning with his years of experience and you know you are in good hands.

Ren H.

In love with the whole crew at their office. Dr. Jeff is the best dentist in Tucson. Period!

Chris S.

A great dental experience!

The staff and office managers are very professional and caring at the same time. The care I received was attentive and thoughtful.

They give a personal touch and make you feel like they have known you and your specific dental history forever.

Stephanie R.

They are great! Wish my mouth would cooperate with all this great work and care they have done for me!!

Mary R.

Always friendly and professional! When I first became a patient of Dr. Taylor, I was apprehensive because I have been going to the same dentist in KY for my entire life, but Dr. Taylor and the dental hygienists are excellent! The front office staff is very helpful as well. Great office!

Load More

See More Real Patient Reviews
